articles.title: Angela Merkel 'incredibly proud' of BioNTech founders - DW (English)
articles.description: The German chancellor has voiced her appreciation for BioNTech, the small German firm behind the first coronavirus vaccine to get regulatory approval. Merkel said the shot will save "many lives."
articles.content:
German Chancellor Angela Merkel praised the accomplishments and tenacity of BioNTech researchers who developed the first coronavirus vaccine to be approved in western countries.

articles.title: U.S. healthcare workers suffer allergic reactions to Pfizer/BioNTech COVID-19 shot - NYT - Seeking Alpha
